stages.label: Agency Requests
stages.explainer: Agencies submit initial budget requests to the Department of Planning and Budget.

stages.label: Governor's Proposal
stages.explainer: Governor's office develops and releases the executive budget proposal.

stages.label: GA Amendments
stages.explainer: General Assembly reviews, debates, and amends the budget proposal.

stages.label: Conference Committee
stages.explainer: House and Senate conference committees reconcile budget differences.

stages.label: Governor's Actions
stages.explainer: Governor signs or vetoes the final budget bill.

stages.label: Implementation
stages.explainer: Agencies execute the enacted budget throughout the biennium.

milestones.title: Agency Requests Deadline
milestones.why: All state agencies must submit their budget requests by this date.

milestones.title: Governor's Budget Released
milestones.why: Executive budget proposal is publicly released for legislative review.

milestones.title: Governor's Proposal Finalized
milestones.why: Final executive budget proposal submitted to the General Assembly.

milestones.title: General Assembly Session Begins
milestones.why: Legislative session opens; budget committees begin hearings.

milestones.title: House Budget Passed
milestones.why: House of Delegates approves its version of the budget.

milestones.title: Senate Budget Passed
milestones.why: Senate approves its version of the budget.

milestones.title: Conference Committee Convenes
milestones.why: House and Senate conferees meet to reconcile budget differences.

milestones.title: Final Budget Agreed
milestones.why: Conference committee reaches agreement on final budget bill.

milestones.title: Budget Sent to Governor
milestones.why: Final budget bill transmitted to Governor for signature.

milestones.title: Budget Signed
milestones.why: Governor signs the budget bill into law.

milestones.title: Fiscal Year 2025 Begins
milestones.why: New budget takes effect; agencies begin executing appropriations.

watchNext.title: Agency Requests Submission
watchNext.why: Track when agencies submit their initial budget requests.

watchNext.title: Governor's Proposal Release
watchNext.why: Monitor the executive budget proposal for key policy changes.

watchNext.title: General Assembly Amendments
watchNext.why: Follow legislative debates and amendments to the budget.

watchNext.title: Governor's Signature
watchNext.why: Confirm final budget enactment and any vetoes.
